page.title: 12A HEADMISTRESS-ONE TUESDAY.
page.content: 6.30 Cup of tea in bed. Chat with my husband then listen to the News. 7.15 leave home to attend morning Mass,I arrive at school at 8.15 and put out games for children. Open mail,chat with children as they arrive. 9.00 Morning Assembly.9.20 Registers taken, lessons begin.I discuss work and give out cards,commensurate with ability.I mingle;teaching,marking & discussing practical work.10.45 Playtime duty. 11.00 Allocate group work ie.baking, reading games,gardening & library.Sign for dinners.Hear individual readers. 12.00 Prayers,supervise lunch,chat with staff,teach recorder group.1.15 take all children to Launceston for swimming.Return 15.10.Change books, read story,say prayer,school dismissed I usually stay working until 18.00. 19.30.Dinner and chat with family,read play records,chess,watch tv.22.30 bed.
